executeRequest

java.lang.String executeRequest(java.lang.String urlString,
                                RequestExecutor.Method method)
                                throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                       java.io.IOException,
                                       MambuApiException
Executs a given url with a given request method

Parameters:
urlString - the url to execute on. eg: https://demo.mambu.com/api/clients
method - the method for execution: one of GET, POST, PUT or Delete
Returns:
Throws:
MambuApiException
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
